description:
Your wheels help protect you from bumps and potholes, so show them some love. This thick cable is a solid option for protecting wheels and other accessories.

  • Theft deterring 12mm braided steel cables
  • Locks with one click; no keys required
  • Sliding weather guards protect lock mechanism
  • Includes easy to mount bracket and two reversible steel keys
  • Covered by Kryptonite’s optional Key Safe Program for stress-free key replacements if you lose them in your next move
  • We recommend a strong U-lock or U-lock and cable lock combo to secure bikes in public, high-risk areas
name: Kryptonite Kryptoflex 1218 Key Cable Lock
